# Negotiations Ukraine {#sec-negotiations-ukraine}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- Ukraine refuses negotiations
- Ukraine refused a peace agreement in Istanbul
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=(russia|moscow|putin) (negotiate|negotiations)&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- there was no peace offer in Instanbul[^negotiations-ukraine-1]
- after Butcha, Zelenskyy said he would not negotiate with Putin (but with other russians)
- Putin said he will not negotiate as long as he can win his war
:::
